TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {20650=PERSONAL/HIGH SCHOOL Graduated from Northwood School in Lake Placid, New York in 2012 ... Played three sports in high school (soccer, ice hockey, lacrosse) ... Named team captain while with the soccer program ... Born on July 19, 1994 ... Daughter of Micheline and David Cappione ... Has three siblings, Marissa, Ryan, and Trista ... Currently majoring in Exercise and Health Science., 19461=2013-14 Saw action in all 27 games as one of the Beacons top defenseman … Totaled 10 blocked shots on the year and finished with one goal and three assists … Her lone goal was the game-winner against Saint Michael’s College on January 25 … Earned her first assist of the year in the 3-0 win over the University of Southern Maine on December 6 … Recorded her second point of the year in the 4-3 win over Stevenson University on January 2 in the first round of the Codfish Bowl Tournament … Assisted on the Beacons only goal in the 1-1 draw with Manhattanville College on February 1 … Recorded a season-high two blocked shots against U. of St. Thomas (Minn.) on January 6 and at Nichols College on January 31., 20206=2012-13 Played in a combined 23 games in her rookie season for the Beacons … Finished the year with one assist and a +1 +/- rating … Totaled 19 shots on the season ... Made her first collegiate appearance at Nichols College on November 3 … Tallied a +3 +/- rating at New England College December 1 in a 4-0 win … Recorded her first college assist at Plymouth State University January 18 in a 1-1 tie. }
